component.description: An implementation of the HTML link tag.

property.description: Defines the character encoding (charset) of the target URL. Default value is "ISO-8859-1".

property-extension.short-description: Defines the character encoding (charset) of the target URL

property.description: Specifies the type of display device for which the referenced document is designed. The media attribute is useful for specifying different stylesheets for print and viewing on a screen. The default value is "screen".

property-extension.short-description: The type of display device for which the referenced document is designed

property.description: The absolute or relative target URL of the resource.
Defines the ISO language code of the human language used in the target URL file. For example, valid values might be en, fr, es.

property-extension.short-description: The ISO language code of the human language used by the target page

property.description: Defines the relationship between the current document and the targeted document. Default is "stylesheet". Other possible values are described at w3.org.

property-extension.short-description: Defines the relationship between the current page and the target page

property.description: Specifies the MIME type of the target resource. Default is: "text/css"

property-extension.short-description: The MIME type of the target resource
